alert.note: Alert for Brown; Nicollet; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sibley, northeastern Brown, southeastern Renville and northwestern Nicollet Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairfax, or 17 miles northwest of New Ulm, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Sibley, northeastern Brown, southeastern Renville and northwestern Nicollet Counties, including the following locations... Essig, St George and Fort Ridgely State Park. This includes U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 94 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
